name: @eclipse-che/github-auth-plugin
description: Authenticates the vscode Github pull-request plugin

scripts.prepare: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn test
scripts.format: if-env SKIP_FORMAT=true && echo 'skip format check' || prettier --check '{src,tests}/**/*.ts' package.json
scripts.lint: if-env SKIP_LINT=true && echo 'skip lint check' || eslint --cache=true --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern=true '{src,tests}/**/*.ts'
scripts.build: concurrently -n "format,lint,compile" -c "red,green,blue" "yarn format" "yarn lint" "yarn compile" && theia-plugin pack
